name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, the woman said that after she released the real-name reporting video, the family of the person being reported was spending money to smooth over relationships

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Someone from V2EX shared his experience of being called by the police while using FaceTime. 
As early as two months ago, someone revealed that a special anti-fraud emergency update for FaceTime was added when the Chinese version of iOS 17.5.1 was updated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At the Paris Olympics, a Kim Jong-un impersonator beat up Winnie the Pooh in front of the North Korean team.
@KimJongUnDouble

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 9, Qingdao, Shandong. A female tour guide from Runner International Travel Agency said on the Internet that "If you are poor, don't come out. It's your fault if you come out. Sichuan people are very stingy. They only understood life after the Wenchuan earthquake killed 300,000 people." 
Official announcement: Set up an investigation team immediately to investigate!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, the movie "Devote My Life to the Party" was released. As of now, according to Maoyan box office data, the movie has accumulated a box office of 1.269 million. Netizens responded, "I don't understand. If 98 million party members go to watch and learn, carry forward the revolutionary spirit, and each person contributes a 50-yuan ticket, there will be nearly 5 billion box office."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 10, Hefei, Anhui. An old man went to a pharmacy to buy medicine for toothache, but the pharmacy prescribed a bunch of medicines, including some medicines that were not suitable for his condition: kidney tonic medicine, liver tonic medicine, stomach tonic medicine. His daughter found out and went to the pharmacy to argue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 10, a malfunction occurred in the magic carpet project at Detian Waterfall Scenic Area in Chongzuo, Guangxi, resulting in the death of one tourist and injuries to more than 60 tourists.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Beijing Huatu Education Dazhou Branch was fined 200,000 yuan for spreading the message that "the end of the universe is the establishment, and the end of the establishment is the civil servants". In response, netizens replied, "Is there a fine for telling the truth?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 10, Zhongshan, Guangdong. A multiple murder case caused by emotional entanglement occurred in Henglan Town. Chat records show that a person with a female profile picture sent two photos to others. One photo showed a man lying in a pool of blood, and a woman lying on the ground next to him; in the other photo, two children were lying on the bed with blood on their bodies. Some netizens said that the man killed his ex-wife's family, and 4 people died at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police reported that the case resulted in three deaths and one injury. The suspect has been detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Shanghai netizen posted a video complaining about the high price of vegetables: "Shanghai vegetables are more expensive than meat, I really can't afford them." Many netizens also reflected on the high prices of local vegetables in the comment section. A netizen from Anhui replied: "Beans are 7 yuan per pound, I can't afford them."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to reports, a talk show expert seminar was held in Beijing. Chen Zhen, deputy head of the review group of the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television, said: For talk shows to move towards a healthy development path, maintaining the bottom line of socialist core values is the first priority. We must master the proportion and rhythm, focus on positive publicity, and do a good job in dynamic review.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 11, the Meixihu Bubugao shopping mall in Changsha triggered a rights protection movement by property owners due to overdue rent. During the period, one of the rights protection property owners was strangled by the police and taken away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 11, the owners of the unfinished Sunac Future City in Chengdu Tianfu New District defended their rights, and a large number of police were dispatched to the scene to maintain stability.
It is reported that the property will be sold in 2020 and is scheduled to be delivered at the end of 2023. It is now basically in a state of suspension.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that as early as 2005, reporters reported on the case of corpse reselling. According to reports, at that time, the Qinzhou City Funeral Home bought the bodies at a price of 300 yuan each, and then resold them to Guangdong at a price ranging from 1,000 to 1,500 yuan. And officials from the Qinzhou Civil Affairs System were also involved in it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, the China Securities Regulatory Commission said: There is a need to improve services and returns to investors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reuters reported on the 10th: A rocket launched by China on Friday disintegrated in space, generating more than 700 pieces of debris, posing a risk of collision to multiple satellites and other objects in Earth orbit. China's state-owned satellite technology company launched 18 Internet satellites into orbit on Tuesday as the first batch of communications networks to challenge the huge Starlink of US SpaceX.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, anti-counterfeiting blogger “Tie Tou” lamented that it is not easy to fight against counterfeiting. “I have failed in love, career, and money, and now I have to work hard every day.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 11, migrant workers held up banners on the rooftop of Xingda Huafu, Bao'an District, Shenzhen, Guangdong, to protest against cashing out their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 11, Yueyang, Hunan. The water in Tuanzhou Township, Huarong County has receded, and residents have returned home one after another, but their houses are in a mess after being soaked by water. Local residents said that at most they received some daily necessities, and only the collapsed houses received subsidies. Another resident said that "relatives of cadres drove to carry relief supplies back to their homes at night." The local township government responded: the time and transportation method were wrong, and the police have intervened.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 10, Shenzhen, Guangdong. The Longhua Bus Station Square was fenced off. Netizens responded, "The country has finally taken action."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 10, the B station UP host "Zhang Beihai official" released a video titled "The Internet does not trust online certificates and numbers, and history remembers the Henan red code".
The UP said in the video that he could not believe that this method could protect his personal privacy, and cited the incident of Henan bank depositors being given red codes during the epidemic, saying that the public's fear of public power doing evil often outweighs the fear of personal privacy leaks.
The video caused a strong response within the wall. As of now, the video has been removed from the shelves, and the blogger said that he was banned.
The following is an excerpt from the video. Many netizens on YouTube have forwarded the full version.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, the Yangtze River Daily reported that "the process was very smooth! In 15 minutes, American tourists completed bank account opening in Wuhan." Netizens responded, "Don't you want social security? Don't you want a work certificate? Didn't you ask what the card is for?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 7, the Ningxiang Human Resources and Social Security Bureau refuted the rumor, saying that the "high-risk list" circulated on the Internet was false information.
In view of the Ningxiang Human Resources and Social Security Bureau's refutation, we will release the full version of the "high-risk list" issued by the Ningxiang Human Resources and Social Security Bureau to enterprises in our Telegram group one hour later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 10 (Release) A man who claimed to have 38 years of party membership reported in his real name that Wang Xia, the former secretary general of the Shangrao Municipal Party Committee in Jiangxi, had violated laws and disciplines by promoting Mao Qi, the secretary of the Wannian County Party Committee. The man also said that he had reported Wang Xia's promotion of her son's husband to his superiors as early as 2012, but not only did he not receive a response, he was also severely retaliated and politically persecuted. The man said that he always believed in the organization and the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 9, at the breakdancing competition at the Paris Olympics, Maniza Tarash, a contestant from the Afghan refugee team, competed wearing a flag that read "Liberate Afghan Women". She won cheers from the audience. Later, the IOC disqualified her from the competition for violating the relevant Olympic regulations that prohibit the display of political slogans.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 10, Shandong. The man said his Alipay account was stolen and he did not receive any information when the incident happened. Afterwards, he contacted Alipay customer service and they said, "They (Alipay) are not responsible. This is not their fault." On the afternoon of July 2, the man went to a nearby police station to handle the case. The police asked him to go home and wait for notification, but there has been no news so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 11, a suicide note by a 17-year-old girl on Xiaohongshu sparked empathy among netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "In the movie Zhou Chu Eliminates Three Evils, the Venerable advised believers to throw their gold, silver and treasures into the crematorium, but the furnace had another mechanism, and the Venerable intercepted a large amount of wealth from the other side of the furnace... I was horrified at the time, but now I know that the Venerable was superficial. The movie we are showing here is: when you are crying and shouting "Mom, go well" to the crematorium, the other side of the crematorium is synchronously, professionally and calmly dismembering your loved ones."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 11, the Weibo topic #China ranks first in medal list and American netizens break through# topped the hot search list.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: It has reversed, and the current hot search is tied for first place
